DOCUMENT.CASUALTIES: three youths were killed while four of their friends sustained grievous injuries and one escaped unhurt
DOCUMENT.PLACE: Shindewadi near Khed Shivapur on Pune-Satara road
Khed Shivapur Dargah of Qamar Ali Darvesh,
DOCUMENT.CASUALTIES: the deceased have been identified as ,Sushil Kamble, Suraj Kaka Shinde (24) and Aniket Bharat Randive (23). The injured have been identified as Karan Jadhav, Rakesh Karhade, Amar Kamble and Chetan Lokhande
Kamble, Shinde and Randive died on the spot while the others fell down and sustained serious head and leg injuries
